thread.title: You Wont Believe Who Styled Anushka Sharma In This Beautiful Outfit | MissMalini
thread.title_full: You Wont Believe Who Styled Anushka Sharma In This Beautiful Outfit | MissMalini

title: You Wont Believe Who Styled Anushka Sharma In This Beautiful Outfit | MissMalini
text:
Sanaa Shah Feb . 28 . 2017 
We recently spotted Anushka Sharma attend an event looking super chic in a metallic pantsuit from Topshop. However, it wasn’t Allia Al Rufai styling her this time. Shaleena Nathani who is known to be Deepika Padukone ‘s stylist styled Anushka for this event. She paired this shiny pantsuit with a velvet tank from H&M and pumps from Christian Louboutin . Celebrity makeup artist, Vardan Nayak gave Anushka a fresh and simple look that included her hair being styled with bouncy waves. 
Click here to shop, if you’re inspired by this look: 0 TAGS
